content.detailedDescription: My friend and i live on the western slope of colorado, rifle, as we were sitting outside we noticed 2 bright lights flying in unison at the exact same speed. suddenly one of them dissappeared and right after the other did. as we watched they would dim and slowly come back, then dissapear over and over. during all this i was on the phone with my brother 30 miles away in glenwood springs and as i was freaking out over the phone he decided to check out the sky as well. amazingly enough he and his roommate saw the same lights flying over head. in this 30 mile radius is rough terrain and high mountains, there is no way it could have been airplanes seen in both these locations.
content.summary: 2 white lights flying overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard on the phone with my dad. i glanced at the sky to my right and saw what looked like two moving stars. i thought i was seeing things, as it appeared to be like two stars from a constellation just moved. so i squinted my eyes and realized i was not seeing things, but that there were two star like objects flying in perfect unison. they were extemely bright and whitish in color. there was no blinking, just the constant bright white. there was no sound. they flew slower than planes do. one was in front of the other, but this is the strange thing. they kept the same distance between them the etire time. it was too perfect. they flew from my right crossing over my house and my neighbors to my left. i then ran in front to continue watching until they disappeared over some trees that then blocked my sight. the entire time i was in awe at what i was seeing. i was describing it all to my dad who i was on the phone with. i have never in my life seen anything like this and am pretty perplexed. after visiting this site i have seen that other people are decribing the same thing being seen at the same time. how could this be? how could i be seeing the same thing someone in nebraska, new york, and illinios saw and all at the same time?!!!
content.summary: Two star like objects flying in silent unison

content.detailedDescription: the objects being 2 of them appeared as stars, but what got my attention is that they were moving across the sky, at first i thought they were just planes , then i noticed their was 2 objects flying in formation , one behind the other, i saw no flashing lights , only bright star like objects, very high in altitude and traveling at very great speed, the first object seemed to climb in altitude , while doing so light would dim almost till it seemed to go out then light would be bright again, second object following would follow suit . it was as though i saw them enter one side of the state and within a minutes time they were at the other side of state. i could here no noise as you would with normal aircraft.I was fishing on a lake at the time, however their were many stars in the sky this night, but nothing like what i saw.I really felt like i was watching a sci-fi movie. i lost sight of object becaus it was just gone appearing as though it traveled out of sight
content.summary: 2 objects like stars travelling at high altitudes and great speed in formation while dimming and brightening.

content.detailedDescription: Both objects were much brighter than satellites, stars. or airplanes and had no sound. the white lights were somewhat triagular in shape and were following each other at the same speed, although they seemed to speed up and slow down at the same time. three of us observed them for approx 1 minute at the most. we are in rural canada where there are no city lights and are used to see many objects, including satellites, but non of us have ever seen anything like this. that is why we are on your website for the first time. since they were following each other, we assumed they were military, but the movement was not like anything we have seen.
content.summary: Two bright moving objects travelling almost due east one behind other

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting by the fire in eaton, in. looking at the stars. i noticed a shooting star shoot across the sky. a few moments later i noticed to bright "stars" that were sitting still begin to move, keeping perfect distance and moving in sync. they moved across the sky from west to ne for about a minute until they disappeared like the lights had been turned off. the area where the "stars" had been seemed to be surrounded by planes from all directions. as we watched we noticed a plane in the eastern sky that seemed to be following a dim light moving in a zigzag motion until it disappeared also.
content.summary: 2 non blinking moving lights

content.detailedDescription: Was outside this evening talking to some neighbors. i looked up into the sky and saw two objects that appeared to be large stars. one was following the other as they traveled nw at a moderate speed. several of us witnessed the event. at first i thought they might be satellites, but they seemed to be too low, and moving in a slight curve.
content.summary: 2 objects

content.detailedDescription: I was on lincoln lake in kent county.  from the south west i spotted two bright lights.  it appeared they were moving very quickly to the north east.  the light would fade from the ufo in front and then the one following would get brighter.  from where we were it seemed that the one following was 6 inches behind the other.  we watched them go to the ne and all of a sudden their lights dissapeared.
content.summary: Two bright lights one in front of the other...Travelling same speed...Sw to ne

content.detailedDescription: i was outside this evening, as i am most nights< when i noticed a triangular shape of lights(3). i continued watching the lights as i called my wife(a complete sceptic,...As was i) to witnes the event. the lights then moved into a single file line and moved at a high rate of speed to the ne untill they disappeared. the lights did not flash or blink like a plane, but were solid white, more like a star. i have never before seen or reported anything like this. i know what i saw tonight was something special!
content.summary: Three bright lights over southern il.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking from my niehbors and it was very clear, so i was looking at the stars. and i seen a brightly lit object(star like orb)flying at high speed from south to north.I watched it for a minute then when i noticed it wasent a plane of any kind i ran home to tell my family to come look.
when they came out into the yard, it was just fadeing out of sight, when my niehbor matt came up and asked what we were doing.I told him looking for a ufo we just seen,i told him what it looked like.And just then he turned round and said 'hey was that it'and sure as im alive there were 2 more, but much lower heading from s.W  to n.E...As they flew silently by,one leading the other,between us and the stars you could clearly see that they were orbs or circular shape,and bighly iluminated. we watched them for maby 4-5(seemed like longer,but i dont think so) minutes,and then the first one faded out and then the second did the same.They were gone.No sound or disturbance...
in all they were seen by myself my wife my youngest son 11,my doughter 4,my friend matt and his girlfreind.We were all very excited,but my kids were frightend...
content.summary: 2 ufo's passed closely over head. seen by 5 peopl.

content.detailedDescription: Here is the cell phone picture sorry i cant even see it on here by the time i ran in to get my cell phone off the charger it was almost gone,so you know the light you see that is kind of orange is a street light that just came on its right above it between the power lines headed away from the camera. maybe if you guys can lighten the picture up you can see it?
content.summary: Was just out side with the kids and my girl friend said babe look there it is again, it was right above us and south a little i then ran inside to get the camera came back out and in just seconds it was gone in the north east.

content.detailedDescription:
i had gone outside to close my shop for the night.  on my way back to the house i looked up and saw the two lights moving in unison from south west to north east.  i am a mufon member so i am frequently looking up at the night sky whenever i am out at night.  these lights were moving about the speed and altitude of the commercial airliners that i frequently see going over at night. they were passing a little north west of my position. 
   what made these lights stand out was the fact that there was no normal aircraft strobes visible and they were moving in unison (one behind the other about thumb to forfinger apart at arms length ) with no discernable motion changes between them and no jet engine sound that i could hear.  i was quite excited, i ran around to the north side of the house so as to not lose sight of them. i lost sight of them shortly after i moved as they went into the clouds that were north east of my position.
content.summary: 2 blue/white lights moving in unison

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette on my back porch,when i looked up and i saw two stars,and i noticed that they were moving,they were following each other,they didn't look no higher than the average flying passenger jet,following each other more than a few hundred feet apart.They weren't traveling at real high speed either,because i watched them for a few minutes,my neighbor and his son was outside at the same time,i told him to look at that and he told me that it was the space station and space shuttle going across the sky,now i know it doesn't seem possible that the space shuttle could follow the station,because it would be docked to it,i do know that the shuttle undocked from the station today,but don't you think that the shuttle will be going one way and the station the other,for the shuttle to come back home?I know they weren't meteors or a shooting star because i have seen those and they go across the sky very fast and fade out,this was very much in a controlled speed,i look up at the sky every night hoping to see one of these things,i didn't get to see no shape or nothing,they just looked like bright stars in the sky,i tried to get a picture of them,because my fridge is next to my porch door and there's a camera on top of it,but it didn't come out,so i do have a question for mufon is it possible to see the space station from the gound? and if the shuttle detached from the station would it look like it was following the station and can you see that from the ground? if you can e-mail me back a reply i would appreciate it.Thank you for taking the time to read this.
content.summary: They looked like two stars.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were standing outside our house, we noticed two star like objects coming out of the southeast, moving northwest...Traveling at equal distance of each other, perhaps connected.  very strange light hugh, almost irredescent, but still bright.  there was absolutely no sound, no blinking, just solid lights.  it looked to have been one to two thousand feet up in the air... very eerie.
content.summary: Two lights traveling in parallel? or one craft.

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:19pm september 8th 2009, i stepped out onto my back deck (lights off).  as i shut the door (facing due north), i turned my head up and to the west.  

above (high in sky), something immediately caught my eye.  i focused my attention on the stars, but it appeared one was moving slowly. i looked carefully and noticed a second 'star' (what i can describe as a distance of 12 inches if i were to point at the objects with each hand).  i did not see any blinking lights or pulsing or colors... simply silent movement of what appeared as bright stars.  

the speed and direction of the objects would be similar to an approach pattern over lake ontario to turn around near the rochester pier to land at roc. however, this was entirely different.  silent, no other visible aircraft in sky.  the objects' altitude can not be determined... thus, speed can not be determined.  i had the sense that the objects were rather high... the sky was clear with average humidity. thus, the speed would be impressive.  the whole episode may have lasted less than 30 seconds covering a third of the sky. 

the two bright star objects moved ne one in front of the other in formation.  the first dimmed as it increased altitude slightly and accelerated steadily and dimmed to nothing... as the first was dimming the second object began the exact same process. the rate of acceleration and dimming of brightness was consistent.  i think the angle of the light on craft or plane may have had something to do with the dimming effect.  

it was clearly not a pair of planes on approach.  i wondered if it was helocopters or c-130s flying to fort drum, but the pattern of acceleration (not sure if out of bounds for known aircraft)... was highly unusual. also, having lived at my house for 8 years and in this general area my whole life, this was unique.  the thing is, there was never any noise... i waited about 3 minutes for any noise to arrive... nothing.  also, after the objects brightness dimmed and got smaller, the speed and slight upward direction was amazing if indeed at high altitude... that would mean high speed and no noise. i would describe the acceleration as smooth (no kicking in phase)... the objects acceleration rate compounded as the object dimmed to not being visible.  it appeared that each object began this process at approximately the same location... one before the other. (no video or photo) / personal observation from home near intersection of chambers street and route 36 (washington street) in the town of ogden, spencerport zip code 14559
content.summary: Two bright star objects moving ne one in front of the other in formation.  the first dimmed as it increased altitude slightly and accelerated steadily and dimmed to nothing... as the first was dimming the second object began the exact same process.

content.detailedDescription: We watched 2 lights traveling at the same speed away from us going sw-ne (not as fast as a commercial airliner) keeping exact distance apart. no flashing lights, no color other than bright white, steady light and no noise. (helicopters located at the airport less than 3 miles away are noisy and we are use to that sound. commercial liners fly higher in the east west fly way along i-80, make noise and you can see strobes of the red and white colors.) lights maintained same speed and brightness for at least 5 minutes before fading out. a friend living east of town was called and observed the same lights until they slowly faded away. not airplanes. calls to the airport tower in grand island were not answered. this was not two meteorites or any satellites. have seen plenty of those out here in the country. hoping someone saw the same ones !
content.summary: Two lights traveling sw to ne at same speed keeping same distance apart. same brightness as star (or planet) that was bright. in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along a very dark road near my house in rural ky, hickory, getting some exercise when i looked up and saw 3 balls of white light slowly moving together across the sky from west to east.  one dissolved and the other two continued on... heading east.  there was no noise, no flashing, just balls of white light.  very peculiar as they appeared out of nowhere and they basically grazed across the sky.  

as a side note, i was on the phone with my mom, in dc who just received a crystal pendulum i sent her.  i didn't mention i was seeing ufos right at that instance as not to scare her but she said, "natalie i just asked the pendulum if you're happy right now and it bent the chain spiraling hugely going anti-gravity ~  omg!"  that was all i needed to know because i was very happy to see them.  it's just me and mufon's secret!
content.summary: 3 balls of white light in formation floating across the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i have been seeing odd things in the night sky for the past couple weeks here in the livingston county area. this is the first sightings we have ever seen in our life, and it has been a wild summer watching the night sky. all of these objects seen have been seen low to the ground around 1000 feet up or so.

1. three weeks ago over brighton we saw four large orange glowing lights in the sky, they were scanning the ground and moving slowly towards the south east, and a few went north. they were about the size of a full moon.

2. twice in the past two weeks we have seen odd/fake looking meteorites hitting the ground to the north/east of us. they come down slow, are a brilliant white firey disc. i know these are not meteorites becuase the speed they are traveling and they are fully ignited and do not burn out, and they are much larger. 

3. tonight while walking our dog outside, we saw what looked like two planes comming our way. both were lit up white like a star, once they passed over (slowly) we relized thses two objects were way to close to be planes (they would have hit each other) and they were moving in a fixated form, and the wildest thing is that they looked like big stars in the sky moving together. one in front one in back about 300 feet. the catch here is that this was one object because as it passed over it covered up the stars behind it. once it passed us the first light went out follwed by the second. we thought a cloud had covered it up, but relized that the stars were still visible. 

all we can say is there are alot of objects in the night sky, that are fake looking, or shall i say do not fit the description of aircraft,helicopters,typical meterites, are all silent,slow mowing,scanning like,and why is this happening over brighton/howell area?
content.summary: What is going on in livingston county?!

content.detailedDescription: I was camping in a state park and sitting around the campfire.  with me were my son who is  26 year old stockbroker in colorado and his girlfriend.  while watching the sky i noticed two normal satellites pass by and one aircraft (anticollision lights on).  then i noticed what appeared to be a satellite but it was not moving in a straight line.  the movement just appeared to be tiny zigags, almost unnoticeable.  i yelled at my son and his friend to watch.  the object was moving n to s at about 40 degrees above the horizon.  suddenly it got very bright and then it appeared to turn away and then vanished while still high above us.  it did not disappear on the horizon, it was still high in the sky.  i am familiar with aircraft as i have flown as a student pilot about 45 hours and also flown commercially over 100 times.  i was not looking for a ufo and have never even contemplated seeing one.  but the route the light was taking was not normal and then when it got extremely bright it was just very odd and the altitude had to be very high.  it really appeared to turn away.  i was not drinking nor intoxicated by any other methods.  just a dad and his son out camping in colorado after going up there to play golf for week while the weather was hot in texas.  we were near the garden of the gods and the sky was clear with no rain and no clouds.  the object was flying in a straight or smooth pattern.
content.summary: Blip of light crossing n to s on front range of rockies.

content.detailedDescription: My kids were outside and noticed a bright light they thought was a planet in the sky. they were looking at it because it looked odd and seemed to be moving. the object looked to low in the sky to be a star or planet. a airplane was on a direct course with the object. the object, which was 3 to five times bigger thean the plane, then shot under the plane as if to avoid it. the object had looked as if it were in slow decent until it encountered the aircraft. it moved under the plane in an impossible manuver and then shot upward at a 45 degree angle out of sight. the object shot of in the sky and disapeared from view in less than a second.
content.summary: Ufo and airplane encounter.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were sitting outside my house talking.  i happened to look up and see two lights moving across the sky.  at first i thought two satellites were moving across the night sky.  but for starters, they were too low to be satellites.  the lights were bright, while the front light was a little dimmer then the second.  they moved in a straight line, at the same speed across the sky.  they did not blink or twinkle or make any noise of any kind.  they moved relatively slowly across the viewable night sky.  the total view time was around 4-5 minutes.  my little sister ran outside with her camera and tried to record the event after my buddy's cell phone failed to pick up the lights on camera.  you can barely see the lights and its hard to tell what they are so i doubt it can be used as proof.  eventually they lights moved behind the trees and disappeared.
content.summary: Two planet "like" lights moving in a straight line across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside and looked up and saw two bright lights in the sky and i saw one moving very slow and saw it getting farther away from the other light then the other light started moving slowly and then they started moving alittle faster and and one was behind the other then the one in front disappeared and the then about two minutes later the other one disappeared.
content.summary: Saw 2 lights sittng in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Monday evening we went outside at 20:50 to view the iss, noticed jupiter but the iss was to appear on the other side of the sky. after a few minutes we looked back at jupiter and saw this very bright light (about 20:55), it was about 15deg west of jupiter and about 10deg lower in the sky. i'm pretty sure we would have noticed it when we first went out, it was very noticable. if it were on the ground it would look like someone shining a red flashlight at you.

the brightness was like no other star i've ever seen, it was about as bright as jupiter and 1/2 to 3/4 the size of jupiter. we thought it was maybe an aircraft, but it didn't move. the color was pure and solid, an orangey-red. it didn't twinkle like a star, but it varied in brightness, not much at first but after about 10 minutes it faded and flickered as it faded. after about 15min, it had all but disappeared, then it started getting brighter over about 2 minutes, maybe only reaching 1/2 of the original brightness. after a few more minutes it faded away and never came back. i didn't stay outside waiting for it to return, but over the next 90 minutes i checked for it 4 or 5 times, it was gone.

i viewed this in my  suburban backyard in san jose, there is plenty of light pollution from streetlights, but this was a very profound bright object that couldn't be missed. the brightest star that i can see is probably only 10% the intensity of this object, so i don't believe it was a star.
content.summary: Bright solid color (red-orange) light 1/2 size of jupiter ~15deg west of jupiter

content.detailedDescription:
This is sort of a retro-discovery....I was going through some old digital photos and came across one that i took from  phoenix skyharbor airport terminal.  the photo is from 2005.  i remember taking the photo, but i do not remember the phenomena  in the sky over the neck and head of camelback mountain.  something is either generating light or reflecting the afternoon sun.

it is certainly not incoming aircraft as  the glidepath  for skyharbor is east/west.  it could be reflection of light behind me in the terminal, but then i believe i  would see other reflections as well across the photo.  i do not remember which terminal, but i was flying on northwest.

other info
photo taken on a sony cybershot dsc-p72   (3.2 mp)
flash: not used
shutter speed 1/125
date: may 31, 2005
camera time: 6:15 pm (camera was set for eastern daylight time, not phoenix time) so the photo was probably taken at 3:15 pm phoenix time.
content.summary: Lights in the afternoon sky

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a orb off to  the north east orb flashed all different colors. noticed an object shoot from the trees right to the orb that we saw. we watch the object change color and fade in and out. checked the next night to make sure it wasnt a star. sure enough it wasnt there. there have been other spotters of this object and other sightings throughout the summer near the area i live.
content.summary: Flahing orb of light

content.detailedDescription:
[this was written on the ufowisconsin.Com website the night it happened. i am reporting it here for others to see as well but i am the author of this description. there are independent reports on the ufowisconsin website from others in my area from this same night as well, to corroborate my story.] i went to pick up my son from boy scouts tonight, march 19, 2009. i was a few minutes late and saw the place was locked up, so i waited, my van and field of vision directly to the west. i noticed a very bright orange-ish colored light off in the distance. i thought it was mars but it was a strange sight because it was so very bright. i was watching this light when my son came from a playground area nearby, where there were others (parents and kids) waiting outside and watching the skies. the scoutmaster came to the side of my van and we were talking, but i was watching this light. apparently the others on the playground were watching it too but i didn't know this until later. my son saw the single light too. the scoutmaster and my son were not aware of what i saw. suddenly, i realized the light was no longer there. i thought maybe the star or planet had moved due to the earth's rotation, gone behind some trees. i wasn't really thinking anything more about it, other than i moved my head to see if i could make it out anymore. just as i was losing interest in where the light had gone, all of a sudden i was aware that there was a large craft with very bright orangish yellow headlights coming towards us, probably about 1/4 mile away, possibly over the middle school building in town. i'd estimate it was 35 to 50 feet in diameter but that's a guess. it seemed large and close. it hadn't been there before and it took a moment to register what i was seeing. i had a clear shot of this craft, with a bank of 3 or 4 of the same-colored orange lights in a semi-circle out in front [parallel to the ground]. it seemed rounded in front and moving fast, coming directly towards us from the west, going due east. then the lights blinked out [dimmed] quickly, the outside ones, then the middle one. there was no sound. i had my window open as i talked with the scoutmaster. i could see or hear nothing after the lights blinked out, even though it was obviously above the city and should have been overhead at the speed it appeared to be going. i didn't say anything to the scoutmaster as i was unsure what i had just seen. i kept expecting to see the strobe lights of a plane or hear something but there was just sky where the object should have been.

moments after the craft disappeared, i drove around with my son, trying to describe what i saw and trying to find what happened to it. it was like it hadn't happened, but i know it did. i would estimate the object was about 1,000 feet above the ground before it disappeared. it was just past sunset, skies were clear and star-filled, air temperature 29, no smoke or other apparent obstructions. there were trees and houses in the vicinity where i saw this but they did not block my view. time i saw the object was 8:09 p.M. according to my clock. i had not been drinking or fatigued. i saw many stars and a couple satellites tonight, some planes and even a helicopter. this was nothing like any of those.

it was just very strange that the light in the distance could move so fast and then suddenly to appear so close with those lights, then the lights blinked out in sequence and it disappeared.

this was an airborne object in our lower atmosphere, a bright single light off in the west, then a bank of bright lights, propelled forward and then the lights blinked out almost simultaneously (but not quite) and it disappeared.

i reported this to the fond du lac county dispatch and also to the waupun pd. they did not have any other reports about this, or so they told me. i am wondering if anyone else saw this and what it might have been. my son said the other boys and parents were watching something exactly where i was watching and making jokes about it. he thought it was odd what they were saying but he didn't tell me this until after we were driving away and realized what i was telling him i saw. i'd just like to know what it was and see if my story matches anyone else's. thank you for your time.
content.summary: Unknown lights in the sky, dimmed and craft disappeared

content.detailedDescription: on a boat at grand lake.  6 of us observing the sunset, then the moon.  a couple shooting stars, sattellites, airplanes.  then, right over the top of us, very high in the sky a triangular light very bright moving across the dark sky.  still at a very close enough to continue following speed, we all saw the same thing....It poofed and disappeared into thin air.  i did take a photo on my iphone and interestingly the pictures up close.   1.)  looked exactly like the bright bright moving object (triangular)  then the other two photos looked like a round tube looking thing (grayish with a light)....    so, anyway wondering if there were any other reports that night.
content.summary: First it was very bright and in between space and flyzone.  then it simply, disappeared, but not because it was far.

content.detailedDescription: My friend in anahola hawaii pointed out a big ufo shape object hovering and patrolling everynight appeared to big to be a star then would change shapes into like a cross, i took video with my camera and u could see it hovering and changing colors it apperaed to be dancing around in the sky. im from  ohio so i never expierienced anything like this before until i went to hawaiii- so i was laying out on my roof while i was living in wailua hawaii where u could see the  whole sky- i could see the big one every night and  i noticed that there was usually 2 little ones  that  appeared to be more red and  flasshing -to fast to be satilites- but my friend had told me anahola hawaii was 2nd known for ufo sightings besides roswell new mexico- now i am  definatley a believer!! i noticed they are real strong around 4am and are gone by 5:30am but sometimes i seen them as early as 10:30 pm
content.summary: Star like changed into cross glowing red green blue.

content.detailedDescription: We had just finished dinner and my wife spotted an object to the south. i looked up, noticed it appeared to be a plane but the wings were not parallel to the ground and were not oriented correctly.  i ran inside, grabbed my camera, zoomed in and took 5 photos.  the one attached is the best one.  the others were too blurry.  i checked nasa.Gov and the international space station and space shuttle were docked on this day but they were not to pass my home until 8:30pm (just after sunset).  the photo was taken at 7:29pm and it was still daylight outside.  i really thought it was the space station but after a day of checking, it appears not to be the case.  thus, it is unidentified but i highly suspect it to be a satellite in low-earth-orbit because it moves steady, straight, and lasted 3-4 minutes at most.
content.summary: Moved ssw to the nne, steady speed no flashes, glows or odd behavior

content.detailedDescription:
Harmar(ville), pa- 8:29 pm:
observed a dim red orb or sphere heading upriver over oakmont country club golf course.  height a little higher than jupiter.  moving fairly good pace as can be seen in nightshot video posted on youtube.Com/user/seeingufospa.  video shows the screen shot from n2y0.Com to verify it wasn't a satellite.  this may be the same type as the one reported over pittsburgh mills mall on september 5th.  it did appear transparent at times.

i was on phone while filming with a pilot (infinitysends on youtube) from atlanta (who is originally from this area) who's volunteered to try and catch one closer in the sky with me on the ground as spotter.  jimmy wenger in new kensington is also on the phone watch list, as well as energeeeresearch from north irwin.

the night before, pilot missed an orb rising from the edge of oakmont's country club's golf course woods that line the riverside edge of course( he was over murrysville at that time).  it rose slowly straight up, transformed into two white lights with blinking red one in middle--trying to mimic a plane.  it then suddenly disappeared or turned off all its lights while on film (not uploaded yet).

on this night, however, he chased something that showed on radar that was not visible to the naked eye until it stopped showing on radar.  he also had his plane's computer reset while he was flying--something it never did before.  i was glad that was all as i had warned him not to go within 500 feet--because after an orange orb was 500 feet away, the next morning i found my car stereo's station presets wiped out--like the battery was disconnected.  he saw other orange lights on the ground around pittsburgh area but couldn't confirm anything since they were too far away.

he also saw a strange looking 'something' that flew overhead of him with pulsing red lights that was silent.  i believe it was the same one that flew up river (and captured on my video) at 8:54 pm.  this is also included in my video:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=tbuytwbut1s
content.summary: Harmar(ville):  dim red sphere heading upriver over oakmont country club

content.detailedDescription:
My late husband and i were leaving for hartsfield airport at 4am from our home in marietta ga.(bridgegate dr.) as we backed out of the driveway my husband asked who could be walking at that time of the morning. i just glanced and said it must be some middle eastern or arabic woman that can't walk around in the day time.This (thing) was compeletly shrouded in full length black garments from head to toe. he remarked on the height and the fact that the light from the street light in the background could be seen between this being and the ground. there was total space between it and the road. it was not touching the ground? it wasn't flying per-sa it just didn't touch the ground!! it was coming toward us at a slow deliberate pace.
we made a decision not to stick around until it got close to the car and sped off. we also decided not to call the police because they wouldn't have believed us. i called the police from the airport and they said maybe it was darth vaderand the ignorant redneck laughed at us. they also laughed at our neighbors later.
when we returned from our business trip six weeks later my husband was on the driveway when a neighbor stopped to talk to him and warn him about a peeping tom. apparently their son was up watching tv very late one night and noticed a movement on the outside of the window in the den. as he looked up he said he saw an enormous hand. he discribed it as being a huge human hand. he also said he couldn't see a face but a large black hooded figure. our next door neighbor ray got a ladder and was climing on his porch roof to see how someone could get up there! he confided in my husband that he thought he was seeing things when he looked up in the middle of the night and saw someone watching him. that is when my husband told him he saw someone on his porch roof and ours as well. instead of telling me and scaring me he kept this to himself.He didn't sleep well and kept the blinds open in the room ne insisted on staying in alone.
when my husband called me outside to listen to this story i became realy frightened because on several occassions i woke up with the sensation that something? was watching me through the open blinds on the second floor bedroom. also at night and very early in the morning when i was waiting for a towncarto pick me upi had an erie sensation of being watched closely in the dark. i left before daylight a lot. there is more to the story , i saw a show on sightings and they showed a large humanoid figure in the sky over brazil or argentina same being same dress with several smaller ones flying into it's (cape?) i had surpressed this memory after my husbands sudden death.When i saw this show on the history channel or travel? i was in shock for two days and couldn't think of anything else. it all came back. he passed in oct.05
content.summary: A very large  seven feet tall at least dressed in black no feet touching ground, bottom of attire swrling  in motion.
